L

library - package library
 
Library - Class in library.model
A class that represents a library management system with synchronized access for readers and writers.
Library() - Constructor for class library.model.Library
Constructs a new Library instance.
library.model - package library.model
 
library.threads - package library.threads
 

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class library.Main
A main method that reads simulation parameters from the console and starts the threads.
Main - Class in library
A class that represents an entry point for the Library Management System.
Main() - Constructor for class library.Main
Default constructor for the Main class.

R

Reader - Class in library.threads
A thread representing a library reader who enters, reads for a duration, and exits in a loop.
Reader(String, Library) - Constructor for class library.threads.Reader
Constructs a new Reader thread.
run() - Method in class library.threads.Reader
The main execution loop of the reader thread.
run() - Method in class library.threads.Writer
The main execution loop of the writer thread.

S

startReading(String) - Method in class library.model.Library
A method that manages the entry logic for readers.
startWriting(String) - Method in class library.model.Library
A method that manages the entry logic for writers.
stopReading(String) - Method in class library.model.Library
A method that manages the exit logic for a reader and signals waiting threads.
stopWriting(String) - Method in class library.model.Library
A method that manages the exit logic for a writer and signals waiting threads.

W

Writer - Class in library.threads
A thread representing a library writer who enters, writes for a duration, and exits in a loop.
Writer(String, Library) - Constructor for class library.threads.Writer
Constructs a new Writer thread.
